page.title: 14Bayford Station
page.content: The station is in need of decoration and some modernisation. The waiting rooms have been taken down and new ones are going up at present. At{Bayford station}there are two large mirrors, they are used to enable the train driver to watch the passengers. This was intended to allow 1 man trains but these{mirrors}caused problems because of them misting up and also freezing. Then heaters were put on but they were not successful. In the old goods yard there is an aerial which is used as a radio link between the driver of the train and the signal box in case of emergency. {The Ponsbourne tunnel}south of the station caused problems in that the radio signal has to be bounced about in the tunnel because of the bend in it.
